testcase.classname: F02_Login | users could use login functionality to use their accounts
testcase.name: user could login with valid email and password
testcase.system-out: Given registered user with "valid1@valid.com" and "123456" logout to go to login page.passed When user login with valid "valid1@valid.com" and "123456"..................passed Then user login to the system successfully..................................passed
